%%{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}}}%%
mindmap
  root(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream))
    src/
      Entry Points
        index.ts
          Main orchestrator
          Agent execution loop
          Interrupt handling
          Metrics collection
        launch_codex_orchestrator_session.ts
          CLI launcher
          Zellij layout builder
          Process spawner
        dynamic_timeline.ts
          Real-time status
          Log aggregation
      Configuration
        agents.ts
          Agent config types
          Config loader
          Log file helpers
        agentlark.ts
          Lark compiler bridge
          Output path resolver
        orchestrator_cli.ts
          CLI argument parser
          Option types
      AI Integration
        ai/
          index.ts - Backend factory
          openai/ - Codex SDK wrapper
          anthropic/ - MiniMax client
          tools/ - Tool definitions
          instructions/ - System prompts
      Zellij
        zellij/
          cli.ts - CLI wrapper
          sessions.ts - Session & KDL
          layouts.ts - Layout builders
          tabs.ts - Tab management
          types.ts - Type definitions
        zellij_client.ts
          High-level API
      Persistence
        memory_store.ts
          Artifact CRUD
          Memory queries
        progress_tracker.ts
          Agent progress
          Snapshot management
        agentfs/
          config.ts - Settings
          hooks.ts - Event hooks
          logger.ts - Action logging
      Utilities
        cli_styles.ts
          Chalk styling
        project_root.ts
          Path resolution
        squad_status.ts
          Completion tracking
        timeline_status.ts
          Status file I/O
    rust/
      agentlark/
        DSL compiler
        Lark to JSON
    configs/
      agents.lark
        Agent definitions
        Orchestration rules
    bin/
      Compiled binaries
        codex_orchestrator
        dynamic_timeline
        launch_codex_orchestrator_session
    logs/
      Runtime logs
        Per-agent log files
        orchestrator-internal.log
        interrupt.log
    memory/
      Artifacts
        Progress snapshots
        Handoff notes
        Interrupt summaries
    scripts/
      Build utilities
        patch_turso_native.ts
        package_dist.ts
        memory_inspector.ts
        condense_memory.ts
repo_description: a multi-agent orchestration framework that autonomously decomposes complex prompts into actionable tasks through a specialized hierarchy of user-definable agents, orchestrating them across Zellij term
